Class Coordinates

java.lang.Object
  com.moomoohk.Grame.Essentials.Coordinates
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Dir
public class Coordinates
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

This class massively simplifies the way coordinates are processed.

Since:
2013-04-05
Version:
1.0
Author:
Meshulam Silk

isSurrounded

public boolean isSurrounded(Base b)
Checks whether all the adjacent sets of coordinates contain a GrameObject in a certain Base.

Parameters:
b - Base in which to check.
Returns:
True if all the adjacent sets of coordinates contain a GrameObject, else false.
